Thank you, especially for keeping the original English soundtrack. :)
Det funkar inte for mig i Winrar - vad gor jag for fel?

What retard made this archive???!

The FLIC file formats is known as the extension .FLI and .FLC, used to store animation files. It is similar to animated GIF.

The FLIC animation format was originally developed by Autodesk for use with Autodesk Animator (FLI) and Autodesk Animator Pro (FLC).

WHY THE HELL DID SOMEONE CREATE A RAR ARCHIVE USING THIS FORMAT?!

Seriously, whats wrong with people?

Sorry for the anger. But using the flc format like in this way is similar to using a bucket of shit as a cap.

The good thing is, the quality is rather good.

The bad thing (for non-Swedish viewers) is that the Swedish subtitles are hardcoded into the AVIs.

And I agree, mrfr0g, RAR-ing the files, and then give the package the wrong extension really wasn't a good idea.

And for a trusted uploader, the file info really sucks. Here's some info (based upon my concatenated two AVI files that makes up the pilot).

=== File Information === 
File Name:            1-2.Don´t Eat the Snow in Hawaii.avi 
File Size:            1,055,616,880 bytes 
Duration:             1:29:45 


=== Video Information === 
Video Codec:          XviD 1.1.0 Final 
Frame Size:           704 x 512 (AR: 1.375) 
FPS:                  25.000 
Video Bitrate:        1430 kbps 
Quality Factor:       0.159 bpp 


=== Audio Information === 
Audio Codec:          0x0055 MPEG-1 Layer 3 
Sample Rate:          48000 Hz 
Audio Bitrate:        128 kbps [2 channel(s)] CBR 
No. of audio streams: 1
